Literature.Title: Rational design of antimicrobial peptides targeting Gram-negative bacteria.

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=3.1µg/ml),Fusarium solani ATCC 36031(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 64550 (MIC=3.125µM),Candida albicans ATCC MYA-573(MIC=3.125µM),Candida albicans ATCC 64124(MIC=12.5µM),Candida albicans ATCC 96901(MIC=3.125µM),Candida albicans ATCC 200955(MIC=6.25µM),Candida albicans NUH-K 6004(MIC=6.25µM),Candida albicans TTSH-CALB01(MIC=3.125µM),Agrobacterium tumefaciens LBA 4404(MIC=12±1.2µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=14.5±1.4µM),Escherichia coli BW25113(MIC=15.8±1.4µM),Escherichia coli BL21(DE3) plysS(MIC=17.7±2.4µM),Escherichia coli BL21(MIC=194±12.5µM)
